text: Kattathoru Penpoovu is a 1998 Indian Malayalam film directed by Mohan Kupleri and starring Murali and Sangita in the lead roles.http://spicyonion.com/title/kattathoru-penpoovu-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Murali * Vijayakumar * Sangita * Kavya Madhavan * Thilakan * Kalabhavan Mani * Oduvil Unnikrishnan * Bindu Ramakrishnan * Manju pilla * Mammukoya ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by Mohan Kupleri
title: Kattathoru Penpoovu
